agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents investigations and monetary penalties issued due to violations of various laws that include, but are limited to: Virginia Weights and Measures, Virginia Public Weighmasters, Virginia Cotton Handlers, and Virginia Motor Fuel and Lubrication Oils. This series may include, but is not limited to: investigation reports, invoices, civil penalties, copies of checks, photos, correspondence, and supporting documentation.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the receipt and investigation of complaints. This series may include but is not limited to: complaints, investigation reports, findings, photos, letters of caution, letters of warning, letters of advisement, and correspondence

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents log-in, item calibration, confirmations, shipping, and contact information of Metrology Lab clients. series may include, but is not limited to: worksheets, reports, documentary evidence, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents equipment calibration and NIST (National Institute of Standards and Technology) Primary Standards calibration, Weighing Equipment Assessments, Assessment of Mass uncertainties, Proficiency Testing Specification on Equipment, Control Document Distribution, Metrology Accreditation. This series may include, but is not limited to: lists and reports.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the registration of motor fuel brand names by manufacturers, wholesalers, and jobbers selling, or offering to sell, gasoline. This series may include, but is not limited to: registration applications and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the collection and analysis of motor fuel samples. This series may include, but is not limited to: fuel transcripts, fuel analysis, and device inspection reports.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the licensure for Commission and Cotton Handlers. This series may include, but is not to: license applications, surety bonds, letters of credit, of commissions, duplicates of licenses, and correspondence

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_description: This series documents the licensure of public weighmasters. This series may include, but is not limited to: license and appointment applications, weighmaster oaths, employment eligibility verification forms, bonds, banking information, and correspondence.

agency_name: Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services
series_title: Service Agencies and Service Technicians Files
series_description: This series documents the training and licensure of service technicians and service agencies. This series may include, but is not limited to: license applications, certification tests, Certificate of Calibration, and correspondence.
